SEARCH
Package classifiers

Class KNNClassifier

java.lang.Object
classifiers.KNNClassifier
public class KNNClassifier extends Object
The KNNClassifier class implements the KNN classification algorithm.

It is used to classify samples by comparing their features to that of their k-nearest neighbors.

Author:
[Latif Yaya]

  • Constructor Details

    • KNNClassifier

      public KNNClassifier()
      Default constructor initializing k to 5 and p to 2.

    • KNNClassifier

      public KNNClassifier(int k_neighbors, int p_dist)
      Constructor with parameters to set the classifier's k and p values.
      Parameters:
      k_neighbors - Number of neighbors to consider in the classification.
      p_dist - Order of the Minkowski norm for distance calculation.

  • Method Details

    • classify

      private int classify(List<Sample> trainingSet, Sample testSample)
      Classifies a test sample based on the k-nearest neighbors in the training set.
      Parameters:
      trainingSet - The training set used for classification.
      testSample - The sample to be classified.
      Returns:
      The predicted label for the test sample.

    • score

      public double score(List<Sample> trainingSet, List<Sample> testSet)
      Computes the F1-score of the classifier on a test set.
      Parameters:
      trainingSet - The training dataset used for the classifier.
      testSet - The test dataset to evaluate the F1-score of the classifier.
      Returns:
      The F1-score of the classifier on the test set.

    • crossValidation

      public double crossValidation(List<Sample> dataSet, int folds)
      Performs k-fold cross-validation on the dataset.
      Parameters:
      dataSet - The dataset to perform cross-validation on.
      folds - The number of folds for cross-validation.
      Returns:
      The average accuracy across all folds.

    • findBestHyperparameters

      public Map<String,Double> findBestHyperparameters(List<Sample> trainingSet, int[] pValues)
      Finds the best hyperparameters for the classifier using cross-validation.
      Parameters:
      trainingSet - The training set used for hyperparameter tuning.
      pValues - Array of p values to consider in the search.
      Returns:
      A map containing the best hyperparameters and their corresponding accuracy.

    • confusionMatrix

      public int[][] confusionMatrix(List<Sample> trainingSet, List<Sample> testSet, int numClasses)
      Computes the confusion matrix for the KNN classification.
      Parameters:
      trainingSet - The training set used for classification.
      testSet - The test set for which the confusion matrix is computed.
      numClasses - The number of classes in the classification task.
      Returns:
      The confusion matrix.

    • precision

      public static double precision(KNNClassifier knnClassifier, List<Sample> trainingSet, List<Sample> testSet, int classToEvaluate)
      Computes the precision for a specific class in the KNN classification.
      Parameters:
      knnClassifier - The KNN classifier used for prediction.
      trainingSet - The training set used for classification.
      testSet - The test set for which precision is computed.
      classToEvaluate - The class label to evaluate precision.
      Returns:
      The precision for the specified class.

      Computes the recall for a specific class in the KNN classification.
      Parameters:
      trainingSet - The training set used for classification.
      testSet - The test set for which recall is computed.

      public static void evaluateModelOnTestSet(List<Sample> trainingSet, List<Sample> testSet, Map<String,Double> bestHyperparameters)
      Evaluates the model on the provided test set using the best hyperparameters.
      Parameters:
      trainingSet - The training set used for the model.
      testSet - The test set on which the model is evaluated.
      bestHyperparameters - The best hyperparameters obtained from hyperparameter tuning.
